== Description ==
Display the permalink for the feed type.

== Usage ==

%%%<?php the_feed_link( $anchor, $feed ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$anchor|string|The link's anchor text.}}

{{Parameter|$feed|string|Feed type|optional|''}}
